Richard II - RSC Live 2013

An exciting new season from the Royal Shakespeare Company starts with 'Richard II - RSC Live 2013', the sellout production of Richard II (the fastest selling show in the RSC's history), with David Tennant in the title role and directed by RSC Artistic Director Gregory Doran.

Film length: 180 mins
